title: mc_observers::BodySensor
description: BodySensor: update floating base state from a body sensor. This is typically used to set the floating base state from a simulator groundtruth

robot.description: Name of the robot to observe

method.description: Update from sensor or control values

bodySensor.description: Body sensor used to set the floating base state (only used if method=sensor). When empty, the main body sensor will be used.

pose.description: When true, log the estimated floating base pose

velocity.description: When true, log the estimated floating base velocity

acceleration.description: When true, log the estimated floating base acceleration

gui.description: Selects which elements to display in the GUI

pose.description: When true, diplays the estimated floating base pose (frame)

velocity.description: When true, log the estimated floating base velocity (arrow)

acceleration.description: When true, log the estimated floating base acceleration (arrow)
